channel.title: Maker Schedule on Vlad Duda
channel.description: Recent content in Maker Schedule on Vlad Duda

item.title: Maker Time: The Key to High-Performing Software Teams
item.description: Time is the most important factor in creating high-performing software teams. Managers must carefully manage time, scope, and people to deliver successfully. Time: The total time the team spends on a problem. Scope: The functionality of the completed work. People: The number of people on the team and their skills. What teams do with their time is the primary factor in determining their output. Even if you hire the best engineers, they will not succeed if they spend all their time on the wrong things or are constantly interrupted.
